body:
Comment 2: 
I can see that Microsoft's dumpbin crashing with AV. If you want to report the problem
with dumpbin, you should speak to Microsoft instead.

If you have any idea why dumpbin crashing, please let us know, because I don't know. I
really don't follow your reference on pe documents. 8l does produce /<num> section
names, but they are valid according to the document extracts you have provided. I would
be happy to adjust our exe format as required, but I don't know how.

Thank you.

Alex
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
